name: Ditto ◇
rules: ◇ (Prism Star) Rule: You can't have more than 1 ◇ card with the same name in your deck. If a ◇ card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.

abilities.name: Almighty Evolution
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put any Stage 1 card from your hand onto this Pokémon to evolve it. You can't use this Ability during your first turn or the turn this Pokémon was put into play.

flavorText: With its astonishing capacity for metamorphosis, it can get along with anything. It does not get along well with its fellow Ditto.
